doc:
Jean Acker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jean_Acker 0 Jean Acker (born Harriet Ackers, October 23, 1893 – August 16, 1978) was an American film actress with a career dating from the silent film era through the 1950s. She was perhaps best known as the estranged wife of silent film star Rudolph Valentino. Jean_Acker ( born Harriet_Ackers , October_23_,_1893 – August_16_,_1978 ) was an_American_film_actress with a_career dating from the_silent_film_era through the_1950s . She was_perhaps_best_known as the_estranged_wife of silent_film_star_Rudolph_Valentino .
